semantic_description: Add missing RabbitMQ client spans with complete OpenTelemetry messaging attributes so they appear in Jaeger traces.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the queue or exchange name variable 'destinationName'

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the literal string 'publish' or 'consume' depending on context

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.message_id
attributes_to_add.value_source: the 'IBasicProperties.MessageId' property of the published/received message
